scripts.clean: lerna exec -- rimraf *.map fp.js fp.mjs index.js index.mjs dist
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min
scripts.build:cjs: lerna exec --stream -- BABEL_ENV=cjs babel --root-mode upward src --out-dir . --source-maps
scripts.build:esm: lerna exec --stream -- BABEL_ENV=esm babel --root-mode upward src --keep-file-extension --out-dir . --source-maps
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build
